Package com.simulation

Class MovingUnit

java.lang.Object
com.simulation.Unit
com.simulation.MovingUnit
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArmyUnit, MovingBase
abstract class MovingUnit
extends Unit
abstract class for ArmyUnit and MovingBase

stores information about movement (number of field unit will move on) and methods for initializing movement

  • Field Details

    • movement

      int movement
      max number of fields that the unit can move in one turn

  • Constructor Details

    • MovingUnit

      public MovingUnit​(int id, java.lang.String type, Map map, int movement)
      constructor for MovingUnit
      Parameters:
      id - id of unit
      type - type of unit
      map - map the unit will spawn on
      movement - max amount of fields that unit can move in one turn

  • Method Details

    • move

      abstract void move​(Map map, UnitCreator unitCreator)
      abstract method for units movement
      Parameters:
      map - map the unit will move on
      unitCreator - list of units

    • findNewField

      Field findNewField​(Map map)
      finds new field that unit will interact with, based on unit's movement
      Parameters:
      map - map on which the new field will be found
      Returns:
      returns field that unit will interact with or null if fails to find one

      Finding new field is divided into 4 methods - each is responsible for finding a field in specific direction. This method randomly calls out one of those direction-methods in loop. The loop ends if the new field was found. To make the movement even more random, new field is found in range (1 - unit_movement).

    • findFieldUp

      private Field findFieldUp​(Map map, int curPos_x, int curPos_y, int rndMovement)
      tries to find field in specific direction based on current unit's position and rndMovement
      Parameters:
      map - map on which the new field will be found
      curPos_x - current position of unit in x-axis (horizontal)
      curPos_y - current position of unit in y-axis (vertical)
      rndMovement - randomly generated integer in range (1 - unit_movement)
      Returns:
      found field or null if field cannot be found in that direction

    • findFieldDown
